CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR( Document_Category_New__c='Credit Note', Document_Category_New__c='Debit Note'), OR(Debit_Account_Name__c='DLD Charges',Debit_Account_Name__c='Pre-registration',Debit_Account_Name__c='TRADE RECEIVABLE',Debit_Account_Name__c='UNEARNED REVENUE',Debit_Account_Name__c='Interest charges',Debit_Account_Name__c='Demand reversal credit note',Debit_Account_Name__c='Demand reversal debit')),TRUE, false)
CustomField.label: Step3
